remarks: Left multiplicative inverse for endomorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2014.)
statement:
tendoinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tendoinv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendoinv.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoinv.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoinv.o $e |- O = ( h e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
tendoinv.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoinv.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
tendoinv.n $e |- N = ( invr ` F ) $.
tendolinv $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E /\ S =/= O ) -> ( ( N ` S ) o. S ) = ( _I |` T ) ) $.
$d B h $.
$d H h $.
$d K h $.
$d T h $.
$d W h $.
